languages.text: {n}Фигура хохочущей Теодоры фон Валанциус содрогается и начинает менять форму.{/n} "Наконец-то ты начал{mf||а} понимать, как важно избавляться от мусора вовремя! Но поздно. Слишком поздно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Фигура хохочущей Теодоры фон Валанциус содрогается и начинает менять форму.{/n} "Наконец-то ты начал{mf||а} понимать, как важно избавляться от мусора вовремя! Но поздно. Слишком поздно".
traits.speaker: WarpBeastTheodoraUnit

languages.text: {n}The figure of the cackling Theodora von Valancius shudders and begins to change form.{/n} "At last you begin to understand how important it is to promptly dispose of trash! But you've learned your lesson too late. Too late."
languages.original_text: {n}Фигура хохочущей Теодоры фон Валанциус содрогается и начинает менять форму.{/n} "Наконец-то ты начал{mf||а} понимать, как важно избавляться от мусора вовремя! Но поздно. Слишком поздно".

traits.locale_text: {n}The figure of the cackling Theodora von Valancius shudders and begins to change form.{/n} "At last you begin to understand how important it is to promptly dispose of trash! But you've learned your lesson too late. Too late."

traits.locale_text: {n}The figure of the cackling Theodora von Valancius shudders and begins to change form.{/n} "At last you begin to understand how important it is to promptly dispose of trash! But you've learned your lesson too late. Too late."

traits.locale_text: {n}The figure of the cackling Theodora von Valancius shudders and begins to change form.{/n} "At last you begin to understand how important it is to promptly dispose of trash! But you've learned your lesson too late. Too late."

traits.locale_text: {n}The figure of the cackling Theodora von Valancius shudders and begins to change form.{/n} "At last you begin to understand how important it is to promptly dispose of trash! But you've learned your lesson too late. Too late."
traits.speaker: WarpBeastTheodoraUnit

languages.text: {n}西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯的身型咯咯笑了起来，身体不断闪动着，改变了形态。{/n}“你终于明白了及时处理垃圾有多么重要！不过，这个教训来得太迟了，太迟了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The figure of the cackling Theodora von Valancius shudders and begins to change form.{/n} "At last you begin to understand how important it is to promptly dispose of trash! But you've learned your lesson too late. Too late."

traits.locale_text: {n}西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯的身型咯咯笑了起来，身体不断闪动着，改变了形态。{/n}“你终于明白了及时处理垃圾有多么重要！不过，这个教训来得太迟了，太迟了。”
traits.speaker: WarpBeastTheodoraUnit

languages.text: {n}La figura de Theodora von Valancius, carcajeándose, tiembla y empieza a cambiar.{/n} «¡Al fin empiezas a comprender lo importante que es deshacerse de la basura a tiempo! Pero has tardado mucho en aprender la lección. Demasiado».
languages.original_text: {n}The figure of the cackling Theodora von Valancius shudders and begins to change form.{/n} "At last you begin to understand how important it is to promptly dispose of trash! But you've learned your lesson too late. Too late."

traits.locale_text: {n}La figura de Theodora von Valancius, carcajeándose, tiembla y empieza a cambiar.{/n} «¡Al fin empiezas a comprender lo importante que es deshacerse de la basura a tiempo! Pero has tardado mucho en aprender la lección. Demasiado».
traits.speaker: WarpBeastTheodoraUnit

languages.text: {n}笑いを上げるシオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスの姿が震え、変異しはじめる。{/n}「ゴミを速やかに処理することがいかに重要か、ようやく理解し始めたようね。でも、教訓を学ぶのがあまりにも、あまりにも遅かった」
languages.original_text: {n}The figure of the cackling Theodora von Valancius shudders and begins to change form.{/n} "At last you begin to understand how important it is to promptly dispose of trash! But you've learned your lesson too late. Too late."

traits.locale_text: {n}笑いを上げるシオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスの姿が震え、変異しはじめる。{/n}「ゴミを速やかに処理することがいかに重要か、ようやく理解し始めたようね。でも、教訓を学ぶのがあまりにも、あまりにも遅かった」
traits.speaker: WarpBeastTheodoraUnit

languages.text: {n}Die immer noch gackernde Theodora von Valancius erzittert und beginnt, ihre Gestalt zu wechseln.{/n} "Endlich fängst du an, zu begreifen, wie wichtig es ist, den Müll sofort zu entsorgen. Aber du hast deine Lektion zu spät gelernt. Viel zu spät."
languages.original_text: {n}The figure of the cackling Theodora von Valancius shudders and begins to change form.{/n} "At last you begin to understand how important it is to promptly dispose of trash! But you've learned your lesson too late. Too late."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die immer noch gackernde Theodora von Valancius erzittert und beginnt, ihre Gestalt zu wechseln.{/n} "Endlich fängst du an, zu begreifen, wie wichtig es ist, den Müll sofort zu entsorgen. Aber du hast deine Lektion zu spät gelernt. Viel zu spät."
traits.speaker: WarpBeastTheodoraUnit

languages.text: {n}La silhouette caquetante de Théodora von Valancius tremble et commence à se transformer.{/n} « Vous commencez enfin à comprendre à quel point il est important de se débarrasser promptement des ordures ! Malheureusement pour vous, vous atterrissez un peu tard. »
languages.original_text: {n}The figure of the cackling Theodora von Valancius shudders and begins to change form.{/n} "At last you begin to understand how important it is to promptly dispose of trash! But you've learned your lesson too late. Too late."

traits.locale_text: {n}La silhouette caquetante de Théodora von Valancius tremble et commence à se transformer.{/n} « Vous commencez enfin à comprendre à quel point il est important de se débarrasser promptement des ordures ! Malheureusement pour vous, vous atterrissez un peu tard. »
traits.speaker: WarpBeastTheodoraUnit

languages.text: {n}Kıkırdayan Theodora von Valancius'un sureti titreyip biçim değiştirmeye başlıyor.{/n} "Sonunda faydasızlardan kurtulman gerektiğini anladın! Geç oldu ama. Fazlasıyla geç oldu."
languages.original_text: {n}The figure of the cackling Theodora von Valancius shudders and begins to change form.{/n} "At last you begin to understand how important it is to promptly dispose of trash! But you've learned your lesson too late. Too late."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kıkırdayan Theodora von Valancius'un sureti titriyor ve biçim değiştirmeye başlıyor.{/n} "Sonunda çöpü erkenden çıkarman gerektiğini anladın! Biraz geç oldu. Fazlasıyla geç oldu."
traits.speaker: WarpBeastTheodoraUnit
